text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.title: Wynn Bubbles Config
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.chatC: The color of the text in the chat bubble (in decimal format, e.g. 1315860 for white)
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.chatT: Time in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) that chat bubbles remain visible
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.backg: Transparency of the bubble background (0.0 = invisible, 1.0 = fully opaque)
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.maxCh: Maximum width in pixels before text wraps to a new line. Higher values make wider bubbles
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.chatH: Vertical offset of bubbles above players' heads. Positive values move up, negative values move down
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.chatS: Size multiplier for chat bubbles (1.0 = normal size, 2.0 = double size, 0.5 = half size)
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.chatR: Maximum distance in blocks at which chat bubbles are visible from other players
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.backg: Red component of normal chat bubble background color (0.0 to 1.0)
Green component of normal chat bubble background color (0.0 to 1.0)
Blue component of normal chat bubble background color (0.0 to 1.0)
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.showO: If enabled, shows chat bubbles above your own head when you chat
text.autoconfig.wynnbubbles.option.maxUU: Maximum number of words to check for player names in chat messages. 0 = unlimited. Lower values may improve performance
